TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/SelectedListViewItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表清單檢視控制項中所選項目的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of selected items in a list view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A儲存選取的項目中控制項。A stores the selected items in a control. 項目儲存在中所包含的項目。The items stored in the are items contained in the . 存放區中顯示的所有項目。The stores all items displayed in the . 下表顯示如何的範例儲存的項目以及其在範例中的選取項目狀態控制項。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states in an example control. |索引Index|項目Item|在 ListView 中的選取狀態Selection state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-------------------------------------| |00|Item1Item1|未選取Unselected| |11|Item2Item2|已選取Selected| |22|Item3Item3|未選取Unselected| |33|Item4Item4|已選取Selected| |44|Item5Item5|已選取Selected| 根據上表中的範例下, 表會示範如何會出現。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|選取的項目中 ListViewItemCollectionSelected item in the ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|-------------------------------------------------| |00|Item2Item2| |11|Item4Item4| |22|Item5Item5| 您可以使用這個類別的方法與屬性來執行各種工作的集合。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 方法可讓您判斷是否將項目從類別是隸屬。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the . 一旦您知道的項目是集合中，您可以使用方法，以判斷的位置中的項目。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the item in the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用，事件，並成員和類別。The following code example demonstrates using the , event, and members and the class. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼中包含表單的表單名為物件`ListView1`並名為`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code in a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 呼叫`InitializeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or the event handler. 這個範例需要的事件處理常式會正確地相關聯事件This example requires that the event handler is correctly associated with the event [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得集合中的項目數目。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您判斷在選取的項目數目控制項。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the control. 逐一查看集合的值時，您可以再使用此值，您必須提供執行迴圈的反覆項目的數目。You can then use this value when looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 除非的屬性設定為`true`，這個屬性一律會傳回值為零 (0) 或一 （1） 取決於您是否有選取的項目。Unless the property of the is set to `true`, this property always returns a value of zero (0) or one (1) depending on whether you have a selected item.
